name: Poker Tower Defense
description: A game with unusual mechanics, combining classic poker and Tower Defense. Defend your field with dice and win money for new defenders!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 200 MB available space
